I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.

Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat

m + S n = S n + m

forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

exds_int = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (a b : nat) (s : set) => forall i : nat, (a <= i <= b)%nat -> exds s (Iter (f m) i z) : fmap -> dart -> nat -> nat -> set -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope nat_scope _]

dart = nat : Set

diff_int_dec : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (a b : nat), {diff_int m z a b} + {~ diff_int m z a b}
diff_int_aux = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (a b : nat) (t : dart) => forall i : nat, (a <= i <= b)%nat -> Iter (f m) i z <> t : fmap -> dart -> nat -> nat -> dart -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope nat_scope _]
diff_int = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) (a b : nat) => forall i j : nat, (a <= i)%nat /\ (i < j <= b)%nat -> Iter (f m) i z <> Iter (f m) j z : fmap -> dart -> nat -> nat -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope nat_scope]
LQ1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), (card (Iter_rem_aux m z s) <= card s)%nat
LR1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (i : nat) (s : set), let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in (ndN m - card s <= i <= n)%nat -> ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) i z)
card_rem_aux_bis : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), (card s <= ndN m)%nat -> (card (Iter_rem_aux m z s) <= ndN m)%nat
card_rem_aux : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), (card s < ndN m)%nat -> (card (Iter_rem_aux m z s) < ndN m)%nat
LR2 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z)
LQ2 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), exds s (Iter (f m) (ndN m - card s) z) -> (card (Iter_rem_aux m z s) < card s)%nat
exds = fix exds (s : set) (z : dart) {struct s} : Prop := match s with | Vs => False | Is s0 x => x = z \/ exds s0 z end : set -> dart -> Prop
exd_dec : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), {exd m x} + {~ exd m x}
not_exds_rem_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart) (s : set), let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in let n := Iter_upb_aux m z s in ~ exds sr (Iter (f m) n z)
LR3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (s : set), ~ exds s t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z s in ~ exds sr t

succ_dec : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), {succ m k x} + {~ succ m k x}
pred_dec : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), {pred m k x} + {~ pred m k x}
Ds = fix Ds (s : set) (z : dart) {struct s} : set := match s with | Vs => Vs | Is s0 x => if eq_dart_dec x z then Ds s0 z else Is (Ds s0 z) x end : set -> dart -> set
exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (f m) n z)
empty_dec : forall m : fmap, {empty m} + {~ empty m}
exds_dec : forall (s : set) (z : dart), {exds s z} + {~ exds s z}

le_dec : forall n m : nat, {(n <= m)%nat} + {~ (n <= m)%nat}
lt_dec : forall n m : nat, {(n < m)%nat} + {~ (n < m)%nat}

exd_not_nil : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> z <> nil
not_exd_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> bottom m k z = nil
not_exd_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> cA m k z = nil
not_exd_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> top m k z = nil
not_exd_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m z -> cA_1 m k z = nil
nosucc_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> ~ succ m k z -> top m k z = z

left.

intros j H'.
apply diff_int_aux_dec.
